Ah man! Super huge brain fart! I failed to credit the primary illustrator on this book, the fabulous...

Amy Reeder Hadley
Speaking of Wagner. Can you upload Batman/Grendel? It would be great!

Glad you dig it, Oneiromancer12.

I try very hard not to double-up on things that other people have already taken the time to upload. I know it's a slight pain in the ass, but both of the Batman/Grendel books are in the complete Grendel torrent...

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5758147/Grendel_complete_as_of_07-2010

It's a big file, so you should have plenty of time to tell everything you don't want to not download before too much of sneaks in.
thanks alot buddy this is one of the few vertigo series i dont have and a big i love ya for getting it up exta quick like. you are the best
Could you upload Morrison's JLA? Last time I checked, no one was seeding it.
Hey Oneiromancer12. I would if I could, but I can't. I explained in the comments on the Xtnct torrent.

You're most welcome BearTrapHarold and new52.

Yeah, Harold, I had this one sitting on the external hard drive. I'm a big Wagner fan and I really enjoyed this series.
thanks for this, love me some Matt Wagner.
